code: import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EducatorSpace(){const{educatorId}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const confirmLogout=()=>{const userConfirmed=window.confirm('Are you sure you want to log out?');if(userConfirmed){sessionStorage.clear();navigate('/home');}};const linkStyle={textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"educator-space",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"sidebar1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/educator-profile/".concat(educatorId),style:linkStyle,children:"Your Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/educator-courses/".concat(educatorId),style:linkStyle,children:"Your Courses"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:confirmLogout,children:"Logout"})]})});}export default EducatorSpace;
